Qingyang Liu (刘清扬)

<img src="./files/headshot.jpg" width=15%>

I am a fourth-year PhD student (ABD) in Statistics at the University of South Carolina, set to graduate in May 2023.

My current research concentrates on robust statistics and modal regression models. I am enthusiastic about broadening my research by delving into Bayesian nonparametric models.
